subject: Vivo V60 || New Product Launch - Offer Creative

custom_fields.cf_s:
Hi team 
Please help with the product launch creatives for Vivo V60. Need the same in 2 adapts ( Basic template and 15th August Template) 

"https://www.dropbox.com/scl/fo/an4agi9cy7d58934k1osn/AM0_5azxvXDU5z2MKFFPsYA?rlkey=ph8e0jar5ev2rrdgj0txpi6u4&st=8y5pvy3d&dl=0

V60 Range KV (Gold & Blue):
https://www.dropbox.com/scl/fo/ax0fbyah60p5x3j9quq2y/AOa94veaggJhLec2kxT4h7U?rlkey=7sgm1zhql0v09ujfa6wk0k19a&st=dld71evz&dl=0

V60 Mobile Angles:

- No Cost EMI & Low Cost EMI, UPI Offer	
- HDFC, IDFC, HSBC, BOB and Axis	
- Flat 10% Off	
-12 Aug'25 - 31 Aug'25	
-3, 6, 9, 12

Creative Type A-  EMI OFFER ( Normal )

- whatsapp, 
- Screensaver,
- Emailer, 


Creative Type B -  EMI OFFER ( Independence DAY )

- whatsapp, 
- Whatsapp CT

Creative Type C -  UPI OFFER ( Independence DAY )

- whatsapp,

conversations.body_text:
Hi Sonal,

Please implement the below feedback:

1.Across the creatives use the wording EMI payments (Launching vivo V60 on
EMI payments) - Applies to WhatsApp and screensavers
2.The current CT banner title doesn't have a 'launching' word - Suggest to
use this line ('Launching vivo V60 on EMI payments' at the offer band '
offer up to...')
3.In the independence day theme use a tagline 'Paytm freedom festival'
above the headline which can be used post independence day
4.Eamiler - Please put vivo logo which is missing,use the headline of CT
banner here as well, in the body part use the words 'EMI payments' than
EMI, instead of 'limited time only' use this line ' Valid from 12th - 31st
August 2025' and remove the CTA which is not required

Note: Please make these changes. Anytime we may receive the final offer I
will update accordingly.




Regards,

Harish Chaduvula,
Mail id: harish.chaduvula@paytm.com
Mobile:8331897191.

conversations.body:
Hi Sonal,

Please implement the below feedback:

1.Across the creatives use the wording EMI payments (Launching vivo V60 on EMI payments) - Applies to WhatsApp and screensavers 
2.The current CT banner title doesn't have a 'launching' word - Suggest to use this line ('Launching vivo V60 on EMI payments' at the offer band ' offer up to...')
3.In the independence day theme use a tagline 'Paytm freedom festival' above the headline which can be used post independence day 
4.Eamiler - Please put vivo logo which is missing,use the headline of CT banner here as well, in the body part use the words 'EMI payments' than EMI, instead of 'limited time only' use this line ' Valid from 12th - 31st August 2025' and remove the CTA which is not required   

Note: Please make these changes. Anytime we may receive the final offer I will update accordingly. 




Regards,

Harish Chaduvula,
Mail id: harish.chaduvula@paytm.com
Mobile:8331897191.

4.Eamiler - Please put vivo logo which is missing,use the headline of CT banner here as well, in the body part use the words 'EMI payments' than EMI, instead of 'limited time only' use this line ' Valid from 12th - 31st August 2025' and remove the CTA which is not required   

Note: Please make these changes. Anytime we may receive the final offer I will update accordingly. 




Regards,

Harish Chaduvula,
Mail id: harish.chaduvula@paytm.com
Mobile:8331897191.
